thread.title: Fab hotel with lovely service
thread.title_full: Fab hotel with lovely service - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London - West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Hollie M
title: Fab hotel with lovely service
text: We booked this hotel on Laterooms as one of the secret hotel deals, the room was big and extremely clean! Perfect location as Russell Square tube and Holborn were 2 minutes down the road giving you easy access to anywhere! Cookies on arrival were a perfect touch! Couldn't fault this hotel and will be returning if I'm in london again!
